name: Arc Slinger
description: You can twirl your sling in a way that maximizes its effectiveness.
prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, proficient with sling or halfling sling staff
benefit: When using a sling or sling staff, you reduce your penalty on ranged attack rolls due to range by 2. Point-Blank Shotâ€™s damage bonus applies within the first normal range increment of your sling (50 feet) or sling staff (80 feet).
staminaText: You can spend 1 stamina point when making a sling or sling staff attack to gain the benefits of Point-Blank Shot within the first two range increments of the sling or staff.
